divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving on 413 towards 95 highway on 05 December 2008 around 8:15am. I was a passenger in the vehicle and never took attention off object. Noticed large object, round shape off in the distance. Object was shiny, metalic, and still. Drove around bend behind trees and object was gone. Skys were clear at the time.
Summary: Silver metalic round object. Big. Hovering still. Disappeared suddenly.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Newtown
There were no other sightings in Newtown on or around December 5th 2008
